title: Recruitment Platform
description: This recruitment platform is a web-based application enhancing hiring for companies and job seekers. It includes AI based skill quizzes, a CV parser, an AI chatbot, and a job search system.

title: Expenses Manager
description: This expenses manager app is a web-based application for managing expenses, authorization and authentification are also implemented.

title: Recipe Management App
description: A mobile app using React Native and Expo, with a SQLite database. It lets users manage recipes and uses React's Context API for state managements. Features include user-friendly interface, asynchronous database operations, and React Navigation support.

title: Hotel Reservations
description: A RESTful API for hotel management. It features endpoints for retrieving hotel lists, finding nearby hotels, checking room availability, booking, and modifying reservations, and leaving feedback.

title: Employees Manager App
description: This employees manager app is a web-based application for managing employees.

title: Banking Problem
description: This project simulates a simplified banking system, allowing account holders to manage different types of accounts.

title: Multilingual Chat
description: This multilingual chat is a group project which is a chatroom that translates messages in real time.
